songs.title: INUYASHA
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: XXXTENTACION]
Damn baby, what's your fucking name, god damn (Murder)
God damn, god damn
100 hoes
Acid, acid (Damn)
Acid, acid (Murder)
Damn
Acid, acid (Murder)
God damn (Fuck)

[Verse 1: XXXTENTACION]
Kill a fuck nigga for the free
Hundred mothafuckas in the dungeon full of meat (Respect!)
Misagi, Misody, Islam it can't help me
My niggas they grimey, put slits in your cheeks (Goddamnit!)
Any mothafucka that'll claim that he bang
Couldn't be about it so I hang him by his chain (Buck, Buck, Buck)
.40 to a fuck nigga brain
I don't need a silver bullet, boy I let this shit bang (Buck)

[Chorus: XXXTENTACION]
Inuyasha
Inuyasha
Inu- (Ahh, fuck)

[Verse 2: XXXTENTACION & Drugz]
Prophecy told that niggas would go
Get back from the dwellers, no niggas with souls (Fuck)
Blade through your neck, dick in your throat
You ride for your niggas, your niggas a joke, fuck 'em
Man, Drugz in this bitch, I could slide with the four when the plug on the bridge
Bitch, I'm popping out the cut 3-D with the shit, If you layin' in the park with yo bitch, what (Bitch)

[Chorus: XXXTENTACION & Drugz]
Inuyasha (Fuck these niggas man)
Inuyasha (Very Rare, Very Rare Shit)
Inuyasha
Inuyasha
Dirty

[Skit]
Well it looks like he's a little disoriented or something
I gue- It's always possible the guy could be on something
